name: Sirius (Roi)
description:
Welcome to Sirius. Sirius is a vertical scrolling shooter game made with Unity. Inspired by famous games from the same genre like 1942 and Touhou project. 

In Sirius, the objective of the player is to get as many scores as possible. Scores can be gained by defeating the enemies and getting the in-game items. Gameover when your life is equal to 0.

Features:

    - Multiple upgrades available.

    - Special gameplay effects using the energy bar.

    - Boss battle after defeating specific amount of enemies.

    - Multiple profile slots, leaderboard, achievement.
